author: @russomario
text: There is no way to protect static directory?

author: @QWACHU
text: It is good to mention, that if You pass  as_attachment=True  to send_from_directory(), then you can force file download by client web browser. There will be no need to put target="_blank" in anchor links :)

author: @QWACHU
text: If You want to remove directory listing in Apache, go to website config file and remove "Indexes" from Your <Directory> directive(s) or create .htaccess file on webroot drectory with: Options -Indexes
